Hi, Hope you are doing great!!Please find the requirement below, If you find yourself comfortable with the requirement please reply back with your updated resume andI will get back to you or I would really appreciate if you can give me a call back at my contact number (703) 570-8775 * (Ext. 232).

Job Title: Azure Data Engineer
Location: Grand Rapids, MI (Hybrid)
Duration: 6+ Months
Interview: Video
Visa Type: No H1/OPT/CPT Note: Need Local or Nearby Only

Azure Data Engineering and experience with data ingestion within Marketing platforms.

Job Description
This is a great opportunity with a large retail employer.
Data Engineer job responsibilities include:
Designs, codes, tests, and implements data movement pipelines, dashboarding and analytical assets; develops system documentation according to SAFe Agile principles and industry standards.
Design and hands-on development on either vendor or internal applications and interfaces including Azure - Data Factory, Log Analytics, Databricks, Synapse, Power BI, ADLS Gen2, GCP Cloud storage and Big Query.
Assist in configuration and administration of marketing platforms (Google Marketing platform, Salesforce MCI, The Trade Desk ADvendio, etc.) that the team supports.
Build data ingestion into and out of the above listed marketing platforms.
Gathers and implements functional and non-functional requirements including performance monitoring, alerting and code management and ensuring alignment with technology best practices and SLAs.
Partnering with all areas of the business to gather requirements for Data and Analytics and designing solutions.
Participate in agile ceremonies and follow agile cadence to build, test and deliver solutions.
Driving engagement with ITS Security and Infrastructure teams to ensure secure development and deployment of solutions.
Interfaces with the Product Manager and IT partners at the Program level and within other Release Trains to define and estimate features for agile teams.

QUALIFICATIONS:
5+ years of Azure Data Engineering experience including some of the following: Data Factory, Log Analytics, Databricks, Synapse, Power BI, ADLS Gen2, GCP Cloud storage and Big Query
Configuration and administration of marketing platforms such as Google Marketing platform, Salesforce MCI, The Trade Desk, ADvendio, etc.
Data ingestion experience with Marketing Platforms is required
Must be able to work onsite in Grand Rapids MI 3 days a week for 6-12 months
